person.persName: Pleasant G. Jones (Trigg County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Trigg County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Thomas Jones and Frances T. Jones. Married to Elizabeth Kent Jones in Trigg County, Kentucky, on November 1, 1849. Father of Thomas Jones, Martha Jones, James Jones, Cyrus J. Jones, Frances C. Jones, Hibernia O. Jones, Mary N. Jones, Minney M. Jones, and John A. Jones. Farmer in Trigg County, Kentucky, in 1850. Household owned seven enslaved persons in Trigg County in 1850. Farmer in Trigg County in 1860. Owned two enslaved persons in Trigg County in 1860.
